name: Drink'n'Drive - Retro Racing
description:
Are you bad enough a dude to Drink 'n' Drive!? Feel the danger in this intoxicating retro racer, and find out if you can handle the power of beer and car combined!

How long can you roll before you crash and die? Zigzag your way towards destiny as the captivating story of Biff unfolds. Who is he and why is he so dedicated to drinking? Featuring three levels with accompanying bosses waiting to stand in your way!

- Original 8-bit graphics & soundtrack!
- High difficulty!
- Three fast-paced levels!
- Tap to turn!
- Boss fights!
- Meet youth rebel Biff and his non-approving parents!

Note: for now, the game does contain a few ads. If you consider this is a problem - let me know! :) And if you wish to play this on another platform, shoot me a message and I'll see what I can do!
